scripts.build:dev: rimraf dist && webpack --env dev --config webpack.build-resources.config.js && yarn run build:preprocessor && webpack --env dev --config webpack.package-resources.config.js
scripts.build:prod: yarn lint && yarn test && rimraf dist && webpack --config webpack.build-resources.config.js && yarn run build:preprocessor && webpack --config webpack.package-resources.config.js && yarn test:it
scripts.test:it: yarn run run-script-if --bool "$(build-env global.build.testIT)" --then "yarn rimraf ./dist-it-tests" "yarn run start-server-and-test start:it http-get://0.0.0.0:$(build-env standaloneEditors.dev.port) cy:run"
